original_text: And they burned the house of God and broke down the wall of Jerusalem and burned all its palaces with fire and destroyed all its precious vessels.
korean_text: 또 하나님의 전을 불사르며 예루살렘 성벽을 헐며 그들의 모든 궁실을 불사르며 그들의 모든 귀한 그릇들을 부수고

sentences.original_text: And they burned the house of God
and broke down the wall of Jerusalem
and burned all its palaces with fire
and destroyed all its precious vessels.
